definition: a person who has served in the armed forces, to provide veterinary care for
details:
noun
- a person who has served in the armed forces
= example: a person who has served in the armed forces
- a doctor who practices veterinary medicine
= example: a doctor who practices veterinary medicine
verb
- to provide veterinary care for
= example: to provide veterinary care for
- to provide someone with medical care
= example: to provide someone with medical care
- to examine carefully
= example: to examine carefully
- to work as a veterinarian
= example: to work as a veterinarian
